relationships.title: RO/en: Relationships
relationships.description: RO/en: Tools to help improve your relationships with loved ones

i-messages.title: RO/en: Using 'I' messages
i-messages.find-time: RO/en: Find time to share these messages with your partner.
i-messages.text: RO/en: Messages that start with 'I' help reduce conflicts in relationships, while also communicating your needs. Exercise creating messages that start with 'I', which you can use in your daily interactions.

new-message.title: RO/en: New 'I' message

annoyance.label: RO/en: What's something that your partner does that truly annoys you?
annoyance.placeholder: RO/en: Something that my partner does that annoys me is...
annoyance.example: RO/en: Example: Drinks a lot and then gets angry

new-message.declaration: RO/en: Now, use the textarea below to create a statement that tells your partner how you feel. Don't forget to start with 'I', write how you feel and then try to explain what makes you feel this way. Try to avoid using the word 'you', in this case (we know it can be difficult!).

i-feel.label: RO/en: When my partner does this, I feel...

because-input.label: RO/en: Because...
because-input.example: RO/en: Example: Because I am worried about the future

reconnect-with-partner.title: RO/en: Reconnect with your partner
reconnect-with-partner.helper: RO/en: Try these strategies - either on your own or, better, with your partner!

1.title: RO/en: Go for a walk or exercise together
1.description: RO/en: Find time to go for a walk or exercise together

2.title: RO/en: Prepare a delicious meal and have fun in the kitchen
2.description: RO/en: Find time to prepare a delicious meal and have fun in the kitchen

3.title: RO/en: Organize a movie night at home with favorite films
3.description: RO/en: Find time to organize a movie night at home with favorite films

positive-communication.title: RO/en: Positive Communication
positive-communication.helper: RO/en: Try these strategies - either on your own or, better, with your partner!

1.title: RO/en: Overcome your automatic negative thoughts
1.description: RO/en: Think about positive things about your partner

2.title: RO/en: Start a conversation with your partner
2.description: RO/en: Talk about your feelings and thoughts with your partner

ambient-sounds.select: RO/en: Select an audio to play

conscious-breathing.description:
RO/en: For this exercise, find a comfortable and quiet place to sit, where you are unlikely to be disturbed.

Please note that there will be pauses in the audio so you can practice without distraction.

Time: About 9 minutes.

mindful-walking.description:
RO/en: For this exercise, you can walk around the house, the yard, in the neighborhood, in a park or wherever you feel safe and comfortable. Try to not speak during the walk, so that you can focus on your feelings and your mind.

Please note that there will be pauses in the audio so you can practice without distraction.

Time: About 6 minutes.

emotional-discomfort.description:
RO/en: For this exercise, find a comfortable and quiet place to sit, where you are unlikely to be disturbed.

Please note that there will be pauses in the audio so you can practice without distraction.

Time: About 7 minutes.

sense-awareness.description:
RO/en: For this exercise, find a comfortable and quiet place to sit, where you are unlikely to be disturbed.

Please note that there will be pauses in the audio so you can practice without distraction.

Time: About 11 minutes.

loving-kindness.description:
RO/en: For this exercise, find a comfortable and quiet place to sit, where you are unlikely to be disturbed.

Please note that there will be pauses in the audio so you can practice without distraction.

Time: About 10 minutes.
